short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share your screen on Abacus Learning Lab website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This screen share extension is used only for the video class link in Abacus Learning Lab.  To share your screen in the video link, you will need to install this extension to  your Chrome browser.
